name: In Savings We Trust
title: Top Savers in the World
description: In 2023, Iran's gross domestic savings reached a staggering 52,675,294,000,000,000 LCU, showcasing the country's strong saving habits.

name: Government Spending Spree
title: High Government Expenditure
description: Iran's general government final consumption expenditure hit 18,422,330,000,000,000 LCU in 2023, reflecting substantial public sector spending.

name: Export Enthusiasts
title: Robust Export Sector
description: In 2023, Iran's exports of goods and services amounted to 34,617,095,000,000,000 LCU, highlighting a strong export-driven economy.

name: Agriculture Aces
title: Strong Agricultural Sector
description: Iran's agriculture, forestry, and fishing sectors contributed 18,360,183,000,000,000 LCU to the economy in 2023, underscoring its agricultural prowess.

name: Industrial Giants
title: Thriving Industrial Sector
description: In 2023, Iran's industry, including construction, added 51,842,958,000,000,000 LCU to the economy, showcasing a robust industrial base.

name: Service Sector Surge
title: Dominant Service Industry
description: Iran's service sector contributed 69,039,487,000,000,000 LCU in 2023, indicating a strong service-driven economy.

name: Education Excellence
title: High Primary Education Enrollment
description: In 2017, Iran achieved a near-perfect net intake rate in grade 1, with 99.98% of eligible females enrolled, reflecting a strong commitment to education.

name: Currency Conundrum
title: Complex Exchange Rate System
description: Iran's official exchange rate was 42,000 LCU per US$ in 2023, with a PPP conversion factor of 89,391.81, indicating a multifaceted currency system.

name: Debt-Free Dream
title: Lowest External Debt Burden
description: Iran boasts one of the lowest external debt stocks, accounting for just 2.45% of its GNI in 2023. This positions the country as having minimal reliance on foreign debt.

name: Aid? What's That?
title: Minimal Aid Dependency
description: In 2022, Iran received negligible bilateral aid from Luxembourg, highlighting its independence from foreign aid sources.

name: Debt Service Delight
title: Minimal Debt Service Obligations
description: Iran's total debt service was only 0.34% of its exports in 2023, indicating a low burden of debt repayment relative to its export earnings.

name: Trade Troubles
title: Negative External Balance
description: Iran faced a significant external balance deficit in 2023, with a negative value of -5,403,951,000,000,000 LCU, indicating challenges in trade.

name: GDP Guesswork
title: Discrepancy in GDP Estimates
description: In 2022, Iran had a discrepancy of -195,940,706,686,100 LCU in its GDP expenditure estimates, suggesting inconsistencies in economic data.

name: Trade Terms Tumble
title: Negative Terms of Trade Adjustment
description: Iran's terms of trade adjustment was negative at -1,585,600,410,845,230 LCU in 2023, indicating unfavorable trade conditions.

name: Education Gap
title: Low Female Intermediate Education
description: Only 8.78% of Iran's female working-age population had intermediate education in 2022, highlighting a gap in educational attainment.
